STATE COLLEGE NEWS, DECEMBER 2, 1932

Dr. Harold W. 11111111111111 Answers Four
Questions Concerning Signum Laudis

“VALE! ”

“Not lost, but gone beiore"—one member of the
senior class has been graduated from the university
of life and has received her diploma of recognition 111
advance of the others, it is with sincere regret and
appreciation of the meaning of her commencement
that we consider the death of Alice Anderson. a meni-
her of the senior cla

'l‘he student assnclation wishes in express its sin-
cere sympathy to her parents and friends. \\"e realize
that the ﬁle of caps and gowns at our commencement
in June will he made incomplete 11y her absence.
